amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.para: Any contract of employment entered into after September 9, 1993, between the teaching staff and a board which applies to the first two years of the employment of such teaching staff shall provide that the first two years of the employment of such teacher are a probationary period. Any such contract may be terminated during the probationary period without cause.
